articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.title: OnePlus launches five new products, including Buds 4 and smaller Watch 3 for the US - The Verge
articles.description: The Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 phones and Pad Lite tablet are all headed to Europe and India.
articles.content:
The Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 phones, and the Pad Lite tablet, are all headed to Europe.
OnePlus has launched five new products today, including the midrange Nord 5 phone and a smaller version of its Wat… [+3797 chars]
